I have a few simple questions given that you’ve seen my work before:

What education starting from high school do you think I’ve had (especially curious from Dutch people)?

Have you used anything I’ve worked on before? (Next.js, MDX, etc)

What education did you have?

1120336124520484864.text: The @Azure Functions Premium plan meets people where they're at and treats scale to zero as an engineering trade-off. Developers can avoid cold starts by leveraging pre-warmed instances while still benefiting from event based scaling. This is extra dope!https://azure.microsoft.com/en-us/blog/announcing-the-azure-functions-premium-plan-for-enterprise-serverless-workloads …

1122544240804888578.text:
When you think about it, @Github is really the most valuable social network in the world.

“Value” not in the sense of its revenues and $7.5bn acquisition; but in all the positive externalities from facilitating free open source software, for free. Worth 100’s of billions.
